creator: myFree Radio
descriptionHtml:
📻Radio South Africa🇿🇦


Thank you for choosing Radio South Africa, the free AM & FM radio tuner that you can truly rely on. We are dedicated to bringing you all South African radio stations, popular podcasts and much more in one easy-to-use app to wherever you are in the world and the best news of it all is that it is FREE!.

200+ SA radio stations


Radio South Africa is very robust and features over 200 South African radio stations. These includes all the popular and no-popular South African radio stations that have online-radio streaming support.

Below is a list of some of the active South African radio stations that you can stream & enjoy via the app:

SABC radio stations


With the Radio South Africa app, you can listen to all your favorite SABC radio stations and much more from a compatible Android device. Below are some of the popular SABC radio stations that are featured on the Radio South Africa app:

⭐ Ligwalagwala FM
⭐ Lesedi FM
⭐ Lotus FM
⭐ Phalaphala FM
⭐ SAfm
⭐ RSG
⭐ Thobela FM
⭐ Ukhozi FM
⭐ tru FM
⭐ Metro FM
⭐ Motsweding FM
⭐ Munghana Lonene FM
⭐ iKwekwezi FM
⭐ Good Hope FM

Other SA radio stations


Besides being able to stream and listen to all the SABC radio stations, the Radio South Africa app also lets you stream hundreds of other popular and some non-popular South African radio stations that do not operate under SABC Radio. Below are some of the other popular South African radio stations featured on the app.

⭐ Jacaranda FM
⭐ 947
⭐ 99.2 YFM
⭐ Algoa FM
⭐ CapeTalk
⭐ Cape Vibe FM
⭐ Capricorn FM
⭐ Classic FM 102.7
⭐ East Coast Radio
⭐ Gagasi FM
⭐ Heart 104.9 FM
⭐ Kaya FM 95.9
⭐ Kfm 94.5
⭐ OFM
⭐ Power FM
⭐ Radio 702
⭐ Radio Overberg 101.8fm
⭐ Red Diamond World Radio
⭐ Radio 573
⭐ Riovic FM
⭐ North West FM
⭐ Radio Kuber Kontrei
⭐ Smile 90.4FM
⭐ Cybatar Tunes
⭐ The Grind Radio
⭐ Red Diamond FM
⭐ Ubuthebe FM LIVE
⭐ Vuma 103 FM
⭐ Cape Town radio stations
⭐ Plus many more other great SA radio stations.

Radio South Africa Features


Download Radio South Africa today and join thousands of users from all over the world, who are enjoying the following great features:

📻 Stream 200+ South African radio stations.
🎙️ Follow popular local & international podcasts.
🎧 Listen to live SA radio with or without headsets.
✈️ Enjoy all SA radio stations from anywhere.
🎵🆔 See track, album & artist info of playing song.
❤️ Bookmark your favourite radio stations.
🔎 Use built-in search to quickly find radio stations.
💌 Share what you're listening to with your friends.
⏱️ set a sleep-timer to save battery & data.
📱 Use other apps while listening to the radio in the background.

User Feedback


The Radio South Africa Team designed and developed the Radio South Africa app so that you can stream & enjoy your favourite South African radio stations from anywhere in the world, as long as you've got an active internet connection, as well as a compatible Android device.

With that been said, we would love to hear from you. So, whether the app meets or exceeds your expectations or whether it doesn't, your feedback in the form of a rating and or review will be highly appreciated, as this will not only help us in releasing improved future versions of the app, but it will also enable other valuable Google Play users like yourself to make better and more informed decisions when in need of a reliable South African radio stations app.

Alternatively, you can also get in touch with us via email: info@triumph-apps.co.za (SPAM will be ignored) and one of our friendly staff members will get back to you with the relevant feedback ASAP.

We hope that you will find all to be in order and that you will enjoy using the app, as well as look forward to hearing from you soon. Thank you.

Yours Sincerely,
Radio South Africa Team
descriptionShort: 📻🇿🇦 Download and enjoy over 200 SA radio stations from anywhere in the world.

- Removal of native ads.

creator: Global Media -  Radio, Music, Podcasts and News
descriptionHtml:
📻Radio ZA🇿🇦


Thank you for choosing Radio ZA, South Africa's best and most reliable online radio and podcast player. We are dedicated to bringing you all your favorite South African radio stations and podcasts in one easy-to-use application, no matter where you are in the world and the best news of it all is that it is FREE!.

Radio ZA Features


Download Radio ZA today and join thousands of users from South Africa and all over the world, who are enjoying the following great features at no cost:
📻 Enjoy more than 200 South African radio stations.
🎙️ Follow your favorite SA & international podcasts.
🎧 Listen to radios/podcasts with or without headsets.
✈️ Enjoy all SA radios & podcasts from anywhere.
🎵🆔 See track, album & artist info of playing song.
❤️ Bookmark your favorite radio stations/podcasts.
🔎 Use built-in search to quickly find radios/podcasts.
💌 Share what you're listening to with your friends.
⏱️ set a sleep-timer to save battery & data.
📱 Use other apps while listening to the radio or a podcast in the background.

200+ SA Radio Stations


Radio ZA is a very robust online radio and podcast streaming app, featuring over 200 South African radio stations. These includes all the non-popular and popular South African national, regional, community and online radio stations.

Below is a list of some of the South African online radio stations that you can stream & enjoy via the app:

Featured Radio Stations


With the Radio ZA app, you can listen to all your favorite SA radio stations and much more from a compatible Android device. Below are some of the popular SA radio stations that are featured on the app:

⭐ Radio 2000
⭐ Lesedi FM
⭐ Lotus FM
⭐ Phalaphala FM
⭐ SAfm
⭐ RSG (Radio Sonder Grense)
⭐ Bush Radio
⭐ Ukhozi FM
⭐ Radio Hindvani
⭐ Metro FM
⭐ Motsweding FM
⭐ Radio Islam
⭐ Bok Radio
⭐ Fine Music Radio
⭐ Jacaranda FM
⭐ 947
⭐ LM Radio
⭐ Algoa FM
⭐ Springbok Radio
⭐ Capricorn FM
⭐ Classic FM 102.7
⭐ East Coast Radio
⭐ East Coast Radio Extra
⭐ Radio Pretoria
⭐ Kaya FM 95.9
⭐ Kfm 94.5
⭐ Radio Pretoria
⭐ Radio Pulpit
⭐ Radio 702
⭐ Plus many more other great SA radio stations.

Featured SA Podcasts


Besides being able to stream and listen to all your favorite SA radio stations, the Radio ZA app also lets you explore & listen to hundreds of popular South African podcasts. Below are some of the trending podcasts that you can enjoy on the app.
⭐ The Daily Show With Trevor Noah: Ears Edition
⭐ TechCentral Podcast
⭐ Voices from SA
⭐ True Crime South Africa
⭐ Durban Gqom Music Concepts
⭐ Hillsong South Africa's Podcast
⭐ Matt Brown Show
And many more South African & international podcasts

Radio ZA User Feedback


The Radio ZA Team designed and developed the Radio ZA app so that you can stream & enjoy all your favorite South African radio stations and podcasts from anywhere in the world, as well as long as you've got an active internet connection, as well as a compatible Android device.

With that been said, we would love to hear from you. So, whether the app meets or exceeds your expectations or whether it doesn't, your feedback in the form of a rating and or review will be highly appreciated, as this will not only help us in releasing improved future versions of the app, but it will also enable other valuable Google Play users like yourself to make better and more informed decisions when in need of a reliable South African radio stations app.

Alternatively, you can also get in touch with us via email: info@triumph-apps.co.za (SPAM will be ignored) and one of our friendly staff members will get back to you with the relevant feedback ASAP.

We hope that you will find all to be in order and that you will enjoy using the app, as well as look forward to hearing from you soon. Thank you.

Best regards,
Radio ZA Team
